column3:
“Yummy! My new evening favorite.
I have been smoking multifple times daily for more than 30 years. I haven't had something hit me this nicely in a long time.....from the taste to the exhale to the ahhhhhhh...........good stuff.”
“Taste and smokes great. Finish any errands or activities that requires physical energy. Pain subsided within 10 minutes. Best for pain or sleep!”
“Not the strongest. Doesn't hit you right away but you will gradually feel it. A very chill and relaxing high that eventually gets you tired.”
“Great strain!! Was very relaxed, ate a lot, and took an after noon nap, amazing for anxiety and sleep. First time, definetly won't be the last ! 💖💖”
“Defiantly a knock-out. Hits you almost instantly right between the eyes and quickly moves down your body putting you in a heavy state of lethargy.”
“got mine from TRU med and it was gas!! go getchu some”
“great strain to chill outside or just chill with friends!!”
“Excellent smell and taste. Expands the lungs pretty good.”
“Ive had it from the store its very earthy hard hitting by far 1 of my fav indacaz”
“One of my faves”
“There I was at 3 am eating string cheese and pepperoni, mega munchies. Knocked me out and woke up 4 hours later ready to eat everything”

“This strain knocked me on my ass. The smoke was sweet, made me cough like an amateur, but I felt the high roll in quick in the head and move through the body. Probably should not have smoked this in the middle of the day. Found finishing my tasks difficult and as soon as I sat down I was asleep and down for the count. Great for insomnia, middle road for pain, I suppose it was good for anxiety since it stopped nearly ...”
“🔥 definitely good for sleeping , relaxes u just right.”
“I'm not into indica, but this is the best indica strain I've ever tried. it's absolutely magical. Only thing is it made me wake up really groggy.”

“By far my favorite. I have a high tolerance and have been struggling to find strains strong enough.  Well I found it...smells and tastes funky but, really helped me with anxiety and insomnia but, not so much for pain relief.”
“Very solid indica. Typical indica fare and effects.”
“Very solid indica. Typical indica fare and effects.”
“perfect... Had a really great head high and body buzz! recommended!”
“It is sunshine and rainbows and what not!”

“My experience with Pure OG has been Good,
this indica dominant strain has a Strong euphoria Come Up Followed by a  Sense Of Calmness and   A Relaxed State of mind, 10-20 minutes Later Dry mouth and dry eyes set in, stimulation too Appetite is apparent as Well. Followed by Couch Lock”
“Where do I begin. That's right, I can't remember where to begin, lol! Extra sticky-icky... Looks, smells, tastes and medicates like non other!”
“This strain has the tendency of a very stress free and loose aroma. The high is one worthy one very beautiful medicine before bed or a night out”

“One if my favorite strains at the moment. 
Tastes so earthy and great
Smells earthy, too
My buds were stiiiiccckkyy i love it
This strain takes my nausea away in 3-5mins
Helps with stomach cramps and is a little heavy for all of you night time smokers.
For you indica vets this is a decent strain to get that mild numbness that can get you through your tasks”

“I got to say my first experience at Tru Med was simply amazing. The staff was friendly and were really informed about cannabis and  help guide you to the right strain that helps your specific needs. I will definitely be going back again and recommend this place to anyone looking for some high quality medicine.”
“Can't go wrong with a classic. Coughed like it was my first time and felt amazing. A little goes a long way!”
“Pure OG is awesome. Haven't felt this baked in a long time. The body high for me is strong. And it's a heavy hitter to my head. A little dizzying. But lovin' it. :)”
“Great strain. Nice chillaxin ride that made it hard to stay awake towards the end”
“Hard hitting strain that relaxes the body throughly”
“Good bud! Great OG taste!”
“This strain is a classic OG with a fresh fuel-like smell, smooth smoke, and great OG flavor.”
“Was not impressed with this product”
“My new all time favorite strain. Felt super relaxed and had a nice bodied high. Smoked in wax form. Phenomenal.”
“Very strong pine indeed! Strong headie spaced out tiredness following a extremely fast pace slow down. Great before bed. Relaxing and not giving a fuck.”
“great og great buzz”
“Pure OG is good indica strain, smoking this will make you sleepy, relaxed, lil mood for instrumental music. This helps me for quick nap.”

“Pure OG from 'I.E, The Labs - Highest Tested Meds, I.E' is surprisingly a potent yet mellow smoke, tight dense nug that's slightly sticky and stays that way even after handling. Strong enough to medicate very well but not totally knock you out, until the end after it has driven you tired. Hungry without being ravenously starving, I could eat anything and felt fine with just chewing it forever as it tasted so yummy. L...”
“Great strain. Will not be disappointed. Mildly hard Indica. General overall use.”
“For 25$ an eight this shit is bomb. Aside from that it's still some bomb ass weed. I get pretty stoned and it seems like it takes me a lot to get stoned these days.”

“I forgot I had some tucked away until the other night. Wonderfully relaxing strain. The effects came on quick but slow in the heaviness. But once enveloped in the relaxing embrace I was very content.”
“This had me laughing very hard off very small amounts. Great for small gatherings with friends”
“Got to love a true OG og. pure og hits smooth and has an amazing aftertaste the smoke is skunky yet earthy. great body high works wonders for my anxiety.”

“Method of consumption: Volcano Vaporizer 

Pros: Great pain relief and body relaxation. Smooth draw/exhale. Some tiredness that could lead to sleep if needed.

Cons: Some dry mouth. 

Overall: Worked well at killing pain. No real head effects. Pine/Earthy taste. No sativa effects (would be good for those not looking for sativa effects). Body becomes really relaxed, almost numb feeling. Would recommend for body pain.”

“This is one of my favorite feel-good strains like northern lights. The taste changes from fruity to hashy back to fruity. Simply delicious, it reminds me of the first time I smoked some truly exotic bud.”
“Easy 5/5, made all my anxiety disappear within minutes after smoking. It's a super relaxing strain and was perfect for just vibing out at night. 100% reccomend  you try this strain.”
“perfect... Had a really great head high and body buzz! recommended!”
“Made me feel tingly and very calm. My batch smelled pungent and had small dense frosty buds. High wasn’t too heavy but def helps with evening chill mode or if I wanna go to sleep.”

“One if my favorite strains at the moment. 
Tastes so earthy and great
Smells earthy, too
My buds were stiiiiccckkyy i love it
This strain takes my nausea away in 3-5mins
Helps with stomach cramps and is a little heavy for all of you night time smokers.
For you indica vets this is a decent strain to get that mild numbness that can get you through your tasks”
“🔥 definitely good for sleeping , relaxes u just right.”
“Potent, relaxing body high with amazing euphoria. Can it get any better than this?”

“Just great. Lazy and high - a bit happy:) great for insomnia - slept like a baby(had
 sleep problems)”

“My experience with Pure OG has been Good,
this indica dominant strain has a Strong euphoria Come Up Followed by a  Sense Of Calmness and   A Relaxed State of mind, 10-20 minutes Later Dry mouth and dry eyes set in, stimulation too Appetite is apparent as Well. Followed by Couch Lock”
“Very solid indica. Typical indica fare and effects.”
